2509.verse: وَقَالُواْ|And they say,|113|128|760$ٱتَّخَذَ|"Has taken|91|121|11290$ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنُ|the Most Gracious|140|170|1415$وَلَدًا‌ۗ|a son."|66|96|1079$سُبْحَـٰنَهُۥ‌ۚ|Glorified is He!|114|144|1080$بَلْ|Nay,|50|65|848$عِبَادٌ|(they are) slaves|134|352|7084$مُّكْرَمُونَ|honored.|106|324|11759$

2510.verse: لَا|Not|43|51|30$يَسْبِقُونَهُۥ|they (can) precede Him|177|192|11760$بِٱلْقَوْلِ|in word,|80|95|11343$وَهُم|and they|79|94|256$بِأَمْرِهِۦ|by His command|127|142|1031$يَعْمَلُونَ|act.|92|100|912$

2511.verse: يَعْلَمُ|He knows|83|100|742$مَا|what|53|87|262$بَيْنَ أَيْدِيهِمْ|(is) before them,|132|166|2273$وَمَا|and what|82|116|46$خَلْفَهُمْ|(is) behind them,|133|167|2274$وَلَا|and not|71|88|25$يَشْفَعُونَ|they (can) intercede|158|165|11761$إِلَّا|except|65|79|86$لِمَنِ|for whom|81|95|1794$ٱرْتَضَىٰ|He approves.|107|121|11762$وَهُم|And they,|85|99|256$مِّنْ|from|50|64|53$خَشْيَتِهِۦ|fear of Him,|97|104|11763$مُشْفِقُونَ|stand in awe.|110|110|11764$

2512.verse: ۞ وَمَن|And whoever|108|118|1012$يَقُلْ|says|52|71|11765$مِنْهُمْ|of them,|76|95|730$إِنِّىٓ|"Indeed , I am|114|133|312$إِلَـٰهٌ|a god|57|76|4674$مِّن دُونِهِۦ|besides Him."|116|135|4463$فَذَٲلِكَ|Then that|86|96|11766$نَجْزِيهِ|We will recompense|150|163|11767$جَهَنَّمَ‌ۚ|(with) Hell.|93|118|2655$كَذَٲلِكَ|Thus|77|102|702$نَجْزِى|We recompense|125|150|5793$ٱلظَّـٰلِمِينَ|the wrongdoers.|128|141|377$

2513.verse: أَوَلَمْ|Do not|64|71|2346$يَرَ|see|44|58|11768$ٱلَّذِينَ|those who|89|103|20$كَفَرُوٓاْ|disbelieved|92|106|59$أَنَّ|that|48|62|240$ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٲتِ|the heavens|115|129|351$وَٱلْأَرْضَ|and the earth|111|125|2280$كَانَتَا|were|63|70|4697$رَتْقًا|a joined entity,|121|129|11769$فَفَتَقْنَـٰهُمَا‌ۖ|then We parted them|162|178|11770$وَجَعَلْنَا|and We made|110|126|4805$مِنَ|from|50|66|156$ٱلْمَآءِ|[the] water|97|113|6434$كُلَّ شَىْءٍ|every|107|115|11771$حَىٍّ‌ۖ|living thing?|98|189|11772$أَفَلَا|Then will not|105|287|452$يُؤْمِنُونَ|they believe?|108|199|35$

2514.verse: وَجَعَلْنَا|And We (have) placed|168|176|4805$فِى|in|48|65|89$ٱلْأَرْضِ|the earth|92|109|100$رَوَٲسِىَ|firmly set mountains,|158|175|9319$أَن|lest|44|61|655$تَمِيدَ|it (should) shake|131|139|9914$بِهِمْ|with them,|91|104|125$وَجَعَلْنَا|and We made|110|135|4805$فِيهَا|therein|66|91|253$فِجَاجًا|broad passes|107|132|11773$سُبُلاً|(as) ways,|91|116|11461$لَّعَلَّهُمْ|so that they may|135|148|1621$يَهْتَدُونَ|(be) guided.|101|101|4371$

2517.verse: وَمَا|And not|72|80|46$جَعَلْنَا|We made|81|96|1137$لِبَشَرٍ|for any man|99|114|3037$مِّن قَبْلِكَ|before you|102|118|47$ٱلْخُلْدَ‌ۖ|[the] immortality;|137|152|11779$أَفَإِيْن|so if|68|84|3326$مِّتَّ|you die,|73|81|11780$فَهُمُ|then (would) they|140|354|11781$ٱلْخَـٰلِدُونَ|live forever?|107|321|11782$

2518.verse: كُلُّ|Every|57|73|575$نَفْسٍ|soul|62|95|2507$ذَآئِقَةُ|(will) taste|92|125|3578$ٱلْمَوْتِ‌ۗ|[the] death.|102|135|166$وَنَبْلُوكُم|And We test you|132|165|11783$بِٱلشَّرِّ|with [the] bad|116|132|10252$وَٱلْخَيْرِ|and [the] good|120|156|11784$فِتْنَةً‌ۖ|(as) a trial;|96|169|7216$وَإِلَيْنَا|and to Us|84|157|11197$تُرْجَعُونَ|you will be returned.|156|192|297$

2508.verse: And We sent not before you any messenger except that We revealed to him that, "There is no deity except Me, so worship Me."

2509.verse: And they say, "The Most Merciful has taken a son." Exalted is He! Rather, they are [but] honored servants.

2510.verse: They cannot precede Him in word, and they act by His command.

2511.verse: He knows what is [presently] before them and what will be after them, and they cannot intercede except on behalf of one whom He approves. And they, from fear of Him, are apprehensive.

2512.verse: And whoever of them should say, "Indeed, I am a god besides Him"- that one We would recompense with Hell. Thus do We recompense the wrongdoers.

2513.verse: Have those who disbelieved not considered that the heavens and the earth were a joined entity, and We separated them and made from water every living thing? Then will they not believe?

2514.verse: And We placed within the earth firmly set mountains, lest it should shift with them, and We made therein [mountain] passes [as] roads that they might be guided.

2515.verse: And We made the sky a protected ceiling, but they, from its signs, are turning away.

2516.verse: And it is He who created the night and the day and the sun and the moon; all [heavenly bodies] in an orbit are swimming.

2517.verse: And We did not grant to any man before you eternity [on earth]; so if you die - would they be eternal?

2518.verse: Every soul will taste death. And We test you with evil and with good as trial; and to Us you will be returned.
